snippet: Obama campaign aides are spending their time, they say, looking for Mitt Romney missteps, and they have been rewarded.
abstract: Political Memo observes that with Mitt Romney seeming to cement his position as front-runner for the Republican presidential nomination, Pres Obama's aides and campaign staff are intensifying their focus, ready to pounce on any gaffes or missteps Romney might commit.
lead_paragraph: Obama campaign aides are spending their time, they say, looking for Mitt Romney missteps, and they have been rewarded.

headline.seo: Obama Campaign on Lookout for Romney Flubs
headline.main: The Flub Watch Never Stops for Obama’s Team
headline.print_headline: The Flub Watch Never Stops for Obama’s Team
